Source.Name: clustalw
Source.Summary: A general purpose command-line multiple alignment program for DNA or proteins
Source.Description: A multiple sequence alignment is a sequence alignment of three or more biological sequences, generally protein, DNA, or RNA. ClustalW is a console application for popular Clustal algorithm which performs a progressive alignment methods that are efficient enough to implement on a large scale for many (100s to 1000s) sequences.
